[data-task-id='13'] .b-gantt-task.title: Custom task bar content
[data-task-id='13'] .b-gantt-task.content: Using the taskRenderer you can output any HTML you want inside the task bar element

.b-fa-bars.title: Customization menu
.b-fa-bars.content: Click to reveal a customization panel where you can change some of the many UI settings that are toggleable during runtime
